metadata.description: Marketplace for Metasaver plugins for advanced AI coding

plugins.name: core-claude-plugin
plugins.description: Complete agent and skill system for multi-mono (producer-consumer monorepo) architecture. Features 48+ specialized agents, 29+ skills, intelligent model selection (haiku/sonnet/opus for 60-90% cost savings), and intelligent routing commands. Built for Turborepo/pnpm/TypeScript projects with Prisma, React, and micro-frontend support.
